result.text:
Why are there only two pronunciations for tea?
#BeltandRoad #BRI #tea #China
Just two ways to say "tea"? Either like "cha" in Mandarin or "teh" in coastal Fujian dialect. The "cha" sound spread along the Silk Road, and the "teh" sound sailed via sea. Let's take on a tour to the village of Xiamei in Fujian to know more about that. #BeltandRoad #BRI #tea #culture #China #ChinaPath #modernization

result.text:
The ruins of Xuanzang's pulpit: Exploring the fusion of cultures along the ancient Silk Road
On the eastern wall of the ancient city of Shache lies the ruins of Xuanzang's pulpit. It was built for Xuanzang to preach Buddhism to the local people when he was returning from India. Throughout thousands of years, the ruins of Xuanzang's pulpit have witnessed the spread of religions and the fusion of cultures along the ancient Silk Road. Follow CGTN's Tian Wei and Professor Xu Jianying as they encounter the civilizations along the Silk Road.
Credit @CGTNOfficial @tianwei

East China’s #Zhejiang province is known for its picturesque landscape, #China 
In this episode, Tianran He and Eva May venture to Qingdao, China's beer mecca by the sea. With red tiles and green trees that make up the city's stunning scenery, our hosts embark on another foodie-journey with local delicacies and interesting guest appearances. From drinking beer with a German friend, catching crabs by the ocean and devouring grilled eel the classic Korean way, this episode will leave you hungry for more! #foodwise #Qingdao #China #Travel #Food #Chinesecuisine #Shandongcuisine #seafood #SeaSide 
#NihaoChina #AmazingChina @BeautifulChina

legacy.description: Counsellor & Director. Personal views, Rts are not necessarily endorsements. CPEC. China. Pakistan https://t.co/GCM8rAQnqX

result.text:
Hu Yang’s sword dance Free and Happy
重阳奇妙游 胡阳《逍遥》
China National Opera & Dance Drama Theater 中国歌剧舞剧院
#剑舞 #ClassicalChineseDance #ChineseCulture
#河南卫视重阳奇妙游 Composer: Ji Peng Performer: #HuYang

Choreographer: Hu Yang Oral reading: Xu Tao Calligraphy: Gao Peng As an artistic performance form of classical Chinese dance, sword dance is completely different from other dances. It represents the carrier and symbol of different cultures in a certain period and belongs to the prop dance category. Prop dance is created together with primitive dance; the latter began to appear when primitive humans were working with tools. It was a form of entertainment that combines human body movements with dance. Slowly, with the emergence of swords, there was the existence of sword dance. The transition of human dance from holding stone tools and wooden sticks to metal instruments also reflects the progress of human culture. Tai Chi sword dance combines the traditional Chinese martial arts Tai Chi Sword with the elegant style of Chinese literati to create a dance with perfect integration of artistic conception, Qi and strength. Extracting the elements of hiking and white wine tasting, both the tradition of Chongyang Festival, the performance combines poetry and wine with sword and chivalry in a dance with light and shadow against melodious ancient musical instruments. Wine and sword were both favorites of Tang and Song poets, inspiring many creations that portray romance, liveliness, and humanity. About Hu Yang: A graduate of the Beijing Dance Academy, Hu Yang is a lead dancer at the China National Opera & Dance Drama Theater. He is an award-winning dancer who leads in classic dance dramas such as "Confucius", "The Orphan of Zhao", "Li Bai" and "Soul of the Sage” and has participated in many major performances at home and abroad.
本节目由河南广播电视台全媒体营销策划中心授权使用。 作曲：吉鹏表演：#胡阳 编舞：胡阳朗诵：徐涛书法：高鹏 #剑舞 作为一种古典舞的艺术表演形式，与其它的舞种截然不同，它代表了一定时期不同文化的载体和象征，属于道具舞的一种，道具舞是同原始舞蹈一起产生的，当原始人类在用工具进行劳作的时候就有了原始舞蹈，是将人类形体动作和舞蹈相结合的一种娱乐表演形式，慢慢的随着剑的出现有了剑舞的存在，类由手拿石器木棒舞蹈到金属器具舞蹈的过渡，也体现了人类文化的进步。太极剑舞，将中国传统武术太极剑与中国文人吟诗作酒之情景相结合，打造一场意、气、力完美相融之舞蹈。 仗剑执酒走天涯，诗盈满腹自少侠。
本节目提取#重阳节 登高野游、畅饮白酒之元素，将诗酒流韵与剑侠潇洒相结合，从不同诗人的咏酒诗为切，用刀光剑影舞之，和悠扬的古乐器奏之，还复心神之澄静，复具人性之高扬，活泼欢畅，饱满健举，创造出唐宋诗人特有的诗剑酒的情趣、浪漫、豪迈情怀。#重阳奇妙游
关于胡阳：胡阳 ，毕业于北京舞蹈学院，是中国歌剧舞剧院舞剧团首席舞蹈演员。胡阳曾多次参与“桃李杯”等舞蹈比赛并获奖，担任《孔子》、《赵氏孤儿》、《李白》、《士风》等多部舞剧主演，并多次参与了国内外重要演出。

result.text:
Dance #Tutorial: Chinese dance 'Zigui' from 'Princess Zhaojun' | 云上舞蹈课：舞剧《昭君出塞》独舞《秭归》| CNODDT
Dance Tutorial | 云上舞蹈课
"Zigui" is a brisk dance that conveys the heroine Zhaojun’s dream during her journey to the frontier in northern China, from the dance drama "#PrincessZhaojun". In her dream, she is back in her hometown Zigui in central China, surrounded by mountains and rivers. CNODDT dancer Dou Shuaifang, as the young maiden, will show you the simple happiness Zhaojun once had playing with her friends in the water. 中国歌剧舞剧院原创舞剧《#昭君出塞》中有一段轻快的女子舞蹈《秭归》，抒发了昭君在遥远的塞外思念故土的惆怅之情。她在梦中又回到了故乡秭归，在青山绿水间与姐妹嬉戏玩耍。 本期《云上舞蹈课》，中国歌剧舞剧院舞蹈演员窦率方将为大家展开这样一幅明朗而充满少女情怀的画卷，再现昭君曾经拥有的那份简单的快乐。 
 Follow us! Facebook: https://t.co/xDJyCDb2pI Instagram: https://t.co/MvNxsqeCvD YouTube:   / cnoddt   Dancing China YouTube:   / @dancingchina2232   #ChineseDance #ChineseArt #Dance #Choreography #HowTo #Culture #Performance #CNODDT #DancingChina #中国歌剧舞剧

Traditional Chinese Musical Ensemble: The Harmony of Heaven and Earth | 河南卫视2023元宵奇妙游——民乐演奏《天地之和》
#Hanfu #ChineseMusic #ChineseCulture @HNTV_CFO @Henan_TV @VisitHenan #NihaoChina #AmazingChina #BeautifulChina #dance #Chinese 
Composer: Zhang Qu
Arrangement: Zhang Qu, Wang Wei Chinese
Drum: Wang Jianan
Suona: Liu Xizhan
Pipa: Luo Yi
Bamboo Flute: Ma Yunhe
Guzheng: Mo Yun
In the ensemble, the vigorous and resonant sound of a drum invokes four kinds of instruments representing the Four Symbols in Chinese astrology: the Azure Loong, the White Tiger, the Vermilion Bird, and the Black Tortoise. Each instrument symbolizes one of the four mythological creatures, and also represents the scenery of China during the four seasons.
鼓震四方来贺，弦动八方聆听。中国歌剧舞剧院民乐团动情演绎《天地之和》，通过不同乐器融合碰撞，展现了中华大地四季的壮阔山河之景。
Video provided by All-media Marketing Planning Center, Henan Radio and Television Station @HNTV_CFO

灵感中国Inspiration丨最新版成都米其林指南来咯！米其林大厨手把手教你做川菜 

The thing is, what variety of Twice-Cooked Pork can conquer the hearts of diners worldwide? On the occasion of The Michelin Guide (Chengdu)’s release, we have invited a celebrity chef and master of Sichuan Cuisine to share the recipe he believes is the most classic for Twice-Cooked Pork and his thoughts about Sichuan Cuisine’s road to an internationalized, youth-oriented, and diversified future.  你知道什么样的回锅肉才能征服全球美食爱好者的味蕾？趁着此次成都米其林指南发布，我们采访了川菜烹饪大师，谈谈他心目中最经典的回锅肉做法，以及川菜如何实现国际化、年轻化、多元化。

Credit @videochinatv

result.text:
Foreigners telling Stories - Overseas Employees look at China
Episode 25：Cross-cultural integration Team Assistant of China Railway Group Limited (CREC) Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed Railway Project – Bilga Ben
《老外讲故事·海外员工看中国》第二十五集
中国中铁印尼雅万高铁项目经理部 - 跨文化融合小组助理 – 陈天明
What do 100 overseas employees of Chinese companies around the world think of Chinese companies and culture? The 100-episode media production "Foreigners Telling Stories - Overseas Employees look at China" was officially launched on September 7.
All of them work in the overseas branches of Chinese enterprises, including managers who lead the development and growth of their companies, technical experts who work in the front line of R&D, and a group of ordinary employees who struggle for a better life.
Facing the camera, they tell their real feelings of being in Chinese enterprises and observing China from the perspective of foreigners, expressing their love for China and their friendship with Chinese people.
继2021年《百年大党•老外讲故事》百集融媒体产品境内外播放量突破16亿之后，由中共上海市委宣传部、中共上海市委对外宣传办公室、上海市国有资产监督管理委员会、上海市经济和信息化委员会、新民晚报社联合出品的《老外讲故事•海外员工看中国》百集融媒体产品于2022年9月7日正式上线。
《老外讲故事·海外员工看中国》采访了100位来自全球六大洲40余个国家的人士，他们全部就职于中国企业的海外分支，既有带领公司发展壮大的管理者，也有投身研发一线的技术专家，还有一批为美好生活而奋斗的普通员工。
面对镜头，他们以外国人的视角，讲述自己身处中国企业、观察中国的真实感受，表达了对中国的热爱以及对中国人民的情谊。
#中国 #上海 #老外讲故事 #海外员工看中国 #全球 #世界
Co-produced by

legacy.name: Zhang Heqing

result.text:
Foreigners telling Stories - Overseas Employees look at China
Episode 23：Altamare S.A affiliated to Shanghai Jinyou Deep Sea Fisheries Co., Ltd. - Director - Hugo Vence
《老外讲故事·海外员工看中国》第二十三集
上海金优远洋渔业下属阿根廷阿特玛公司 – 懂事 – 雨果·文森
What do 100 overseas employees of Chinese companies around the world think of Chinese companies and culture? The 100-episode media production "Foreigners Telling Stories - Overseas Employees look at China" was officially launched on September 7.
All of them work in the overseas branches of Chinese enterprises, including managers who lead the development and growth of their companies, technical experts who work in the front line of R&D, and a group of ordinary employees who struggle for a better life.
Facing the camera, they tell their real feelings of being in Chinese enterprises and observing China from the perspective of foreigners, expressing their love for China and their friendship with Chinese people.
继2021年《百年大党•老外讲故事》百集融媒体产品境内外播放量突破16亿之后，由中共上海市委宣传部、中共上海市委对外宣传办公室、上海市国有资产监督管理委员会、上海市经济和信息化委员会、新民晚报社联合出品的《老外讲故事•海外员工看中国》百集融媒体产品于2022年9月7日正式上线。
《老外讲故事·海外员工看中国》采访了100位来自全球六大洲40余个国家的人士，他们全部就职于中国企业的海外分支，既有带领公司发展壮大的管理者，也有投身研发一线的技术专家，还有一批为美好生活而奋斗的普通员工。
面对镜头，他们以外国人的视角，讲述自己身处中国企业、观察中国的真实感受，表达了对中国的热爱以及对中国人民的情谊。
#中国 #上海 #老外讲故事 #海外员工看中国 #全球 #世界
